TestCases.TestDescription: Verify successful mapping of patient identifier from PID.3 to Patient.identifier with a valid patient ID.
TestCases.ExpectedOutput: Patient resource contains an identifier with the system set to 'http://hospital.org/patient-ids' and the value populated from PID.3.
TestSteps: Provide an ADT message with a valid patient ID in PID.3 (e.g., PID.3=12345).
Transform the ADT message to a FHIR Patient resource.
TestCases.PassFailCriteria: The Patient resource includes an identifier element with system='http://hospital.org/patient-ids' and value='12345'.

TestCases.TestDescription: Verify that the Patient.identifier is not populated when PID.3 is empty.
TestCases.ExpectedOutput: Patient resource does not contain an identifier element.
TestSteps: Provide an ADT message with an empty PID.3 (PID.3=).
Transform the ADT message to a FHIR Patient resource.
TestCases.PassFailCriteria: The Patient resource does not include any identifier elements.

TestCases.TestDescription: Verify successful mapping of patient identifier with special characters in PID.3.
TestCases.ExpectedOutput: Patient resource contains an identifier with the system set to 'http://hospital.org/patient-ids' and the value populated from PID.3, including the special characters.
TestSteps: Provide an ADT message with a patient ID in PID.3 containing special characters (e.g., PID.3=12345@#$).
Transform the ADT message to a FHIR Patient resource.
TestCases.PassFailCriteria: The Patient resource includes an identifier element with system='http://hospital.org/patient-ids' and value='12345@#$'.

TestCases.TestDescription: Ensure that the identifier mapping from PID.3 to Patient.identifier remains functional after a system update.
TestCases.ExpectedOutput: Patient resource contains an identifier with the system set to 'http://hospital.org/patient-ids' and the value populated from PID.3.
TestSteps: Provide an ADT message with a valid patient ID in PID.3 (e.g., PID.3=54321).
Transform the ADT message to a FHIR Patient resource using the updated system.
TestCases.PassFailCriteria: The Patient resource includes an identifier element with system='http://hospital.org/patient-ids' and value='54321'.

TestCases.TestDescription: Verify successful mapping of patient name components from PID.5 to Patient.name.
TestCases.ExpectedOutput: Patient resource contains a name element with family, given, and prefix populated from PID.5.1, PID.5.2, and PID.5.5 respectively.
TestSteps: Provide an ADT message with valid name components in PID.5 (e.g., PID.5.1=Smith, PID.5.2=John, PID.5.5=Mr.).
Transform the ADT message to a FHIR Patient resource.
TestCases.PassFailCriteria: The Patient resource includes a name element with family='Smith', given=['John'], and prefix=['Mr.'].

TestCases.TestDescription: Verify that Patient.name is not populated when PID.5 is empty.
TestCases.ExpectedOutput: Patient resource does not contain a name element.
TestSteps: Provide an ADT message with an empty PID.5 (all sub-components are empty).
Transform the ADT message to a FHIR Patient resource.
TestCases.PassFailCriteria: The Patient resource does not include any name elements.

TestCases.TestDescription: Verify successful mapping of patient name with multiple given names in PID.5.
TestCases.ExpectedOutput: Patient resource contains a name element with multiple given names populated from PID.5.2.
TestSteps: Provide an ADT message with multiple given names in PID.5.2 (e.g., PID.5.2=John^Robert).
Transform the ADT message to a FHIR Patient resource.
TestCases.PassFailCriteria: The Patient resource includes a name element with given=['John', 'Robert'].

TestCases.TestDescription: Ensure that the name mapping from PID.5 to Patient.name remains functional after a code refactoring.
TestCases.ExpectedOutput: Patient resource contains a name element with family, given, and prefix populated from PID.5.1, PID.5.2, and PID.5.5 respectively.
TestSteps: Provide an ADT message with valid name components in PID.5 (e.g., PID.5.1=Jones, PID.5.2=Alice, PID.5.5=Ms.).
Transform the ADT message to a FHIR Patient resource using the refactored code.
TestCases.PassFailCriteria: The Patient resource includes a name element with family='Jones', given=['Alice'], and prefix=['Ms.'].

TestCases.TestDescription: Verify successful mapping of patient birth date from PID.7 to Patient.birthDate.
TestCases.ExpectedOutput: Patient resource contains a birthDate element populated from PID.7 in YYYY-MM-DD format.
TestSteps: Provide an ADT message with a valid birth date in PID.7 in YYYYMMDD format (e.g., PID.7=19901231).
Transform the ADT message to a FHIR Patient resource.
TestCases.PassFailCriteria: The Patient resource includes a birthDate element with value='1990-12-31'.

TestCases.TestDescription: Verify that Patient.birthDate is not populated when PID.7 is empty.
TestCases.ExpectedOutput: Patient resource does not contain a birthDate element.
TestSteps: Provide an ADT message with an empty PID.7 (PID.7=).
Transform the ADT message to a FHIR Patient resource.
TestCases.PassFailCriteria: The Patient resource does not include any birthDate elements.

TestCases.TestDescription: Verify handling of invalid date format in PID.7.
TestCases.ExpectedOutput: Patient resource does not contain a birthDate element or contains an error message indicating the invalid format.
TestSteps: Provide an ADT message with an invalid date format in PID.7 (e.g., PID.7=1990-12-31).
Transform the ADT message to a FHIR Patient resource.
TestCases.PassFailCriteria: The Patient resource does not include a birthDate element, or an OperationOutcome resource is returned indicating an error due to the invalid date format.

TestCases.TestDescription: Ensure that the birth date mapping from PID.7 to Patient.birthDate remains functional after a bug fix related to date formatting.
TestCases.ExpectedOutput: Patient resource contains a birthDate element populated from PID.7 in YYYY-MM-DD format.
TestSteps: Provide an ADT message with a valid birth date in PID.7 in YYYYMMDD format (e.g., PID.7=19850615).
Transform the ADT message to a FHIR Patient resource using the system with the bug fix.
TestCases.PassFailCriteria: The Patient resource includes a birthDate element with value='1985-06-15'.

TestCases.TestDescription: Verify successful mapping of patient gender from PID.8 to Patient.gender using HL7 Table 0001 codes.
TestCases.ExpectedOutput: Patient resource contains a gender element populated from PID.8 based on the HL7 Table 0001 mapping.
TestSteps: Provide an ADT message with a valid gender code in PID.8 (e.g., PID.8=M).
Transform the ADT message to a FHIR Patient resource.
TestCases.PassFailCriteria: The Patient resource includes a gender element with value='male'.

TestCases.TestDescription: Verify successful mapping of patient gender from PID.8 to Patient.gender using HL7 Table 0001 codes.
TestCases.ExpectedOutput: Patient resource contains a gender element populated from PID.8 based on the HL7 Table 0001 mapping.
TestSteps: Provide an ADT message with a valid gender code in PID.8 (e.g., PID.8=F).
Transform the ADT message to a FHIR Patient resource.
TestCases.PassFailCriteria: The Patient resource includes a gender element with value='female'.

TestCases.TestDescription: Verify successful mapping of patient gender from PID.8 to Patient.gender using HL7 Table 0001 codes.
TestCases.ExpectedOutput: Patient resource contains a gender element populated from PID.8 based on the HL7 Table 0001 mapping.
TestSteps: Provide an ADT message with a valid gender code in PID.8 (e.g., PID.8=U).
Transform the ADT message to a FHIR Patient resource.
TestCases.PassFailCriteria: The Patient resource includes a gender element with value='unknown'.

TestCases.TestDescription: Verify that Patient.gender is not populated when PID.8 is empty.
TestCases.ExpectedOutput: Patient resource does not contain a gender element.
TestSteps: Provide an ADT message with an empty PID.8 (PID.8=).
Transform the ADT message to a FHIR Patient resource.
TestCases.PassFailCriteria: The Patient resource does not include any gender elements.

TestCases.TestDescription: Verify handling of invalid gender code in PID.8.
TestCases.ExpectedOutput: Patient resource does not contain a gender element or contains an error message indicating the invalid code.
TestSteps: Provide an ADT message with an invalid gender code in PID.8 (e.g., PID.8=X).
Transform the ADT message to a FHIR Patient resource.
TestCases.PassFailCriteria: The Patient resource does not include a gender element, or an OperationOutcome resource is returned indicating an error due to the invalid gender code.

TestCases.TestDescription: Ensure that the gender mapping from PID.8 to Patient.gender remains functional after a vocabulary update.
TestCases.ExpectedOutput: Patient resource contains a gender element populated from PID.8 based on the updated HL7 Table 0001 mapping.
TestSteps: Provide an ADT message with a valid gender code in PID.8 (e.g., PID.8=F).
Transform the ADT message to a FHIR Patient resource using the system with the vocabulary update.
TestCases.PassFailCriteria: The Patient resource includes a gender element with value='female'.

TestCases.TestDescription: Verify successful mapping of patient address components from PID.11 to Patient.address.
TestCases.ExpectedOutput: Patient resource contains an address element with line, city, state, and postalCode populated from PID.11.1, PID.11.3, PID.11.4, and PID.11.5 respectively.
TestSteps: Provide an ADT message with valid address components in PID.11 (e.g., PID.11.1=123 Main St, PID.11.3=Anytown, PID.11.4=CA, PID.11.5=91234).
Transform the ADT message to a FHIR Patient resource.
TestCases.PassFailCriteria: The Patient resource includes an address element with line=['123 Main St'], city='Anytown', state='CA', and postalCode='91234'.

TestCases.TestDescription: Verify that Patient.address is not populated when PID.11 is empty.
TestCases.ExpectedOutput: Patient resource does not contain an address element.
TestSteps: Provide an ADT message with an empty PID.11 (all sub-components are empty).
Transform the ADT message to a FHIR Patient resource.
TestCases.PassFailCriteria: The Patient resource does not include any address elements.

TestCases.TestDescription: Verify successful mapping of patient address with multiple address lines in PID.11.
TestCases.ExpectedOutput: Patient resource contains an address element with multiple address lines populated from PID.11.1.
TestSteps: Provide an ADT message with multiple address lines in PID.11.1 (e.g., PID.11.1=123 Main St^Apt 4B).
Transform the ADT message to a FHIR Patient resource.
TestCases.PassFailCriteria: The Patient resource includes an address element with line=['123 Main St', 'Apt 4B'].

TestCases.TestDescription: Ensure that the address mapping from PID.11 to Patient.address remains functional after a performance optimization.
TestCases.ExpectedOutput: Patient resource contains an address element with line, city, state, and postalCode populated from PID.11.1, PID.11.3, PID.11.4, and PID.11.5 respectively.
TestSteps: Provide an ADT message with valid address components in PID.11 (e.g., PID.11.1=456 Oak Ave, PID.11.3=Springfield, PID.11.4=IL, PID.11.5=62704).
Transform the ADT message to a FHIR Patient resource using the optimized system.
TestCases.PassFailCriteria: The Patient resource includes an address element with line=['456 Oak Ave'], city='Springfield', state='IL', and postalCode='62704'.

TestCases.TestDescription: Verify successful mapping of patient address with special characters in PID.11.
TestCases.ExpectedOutput: Patient resource contains an address element with line, city, state, and postalCode populated from PID.11.1, PID.11.3, PID.11.4, and PID.11.5 respectively, including the special characters.
TestSteps: Provide an ADT message with valid address components in PID.11 including special characters (e.g., PID.11.1=123 Main St #1, PID.11.3=Anytown!, PID.11.4=C@, PID.11.5=912$4).
Transform the ADT message to a FHIR Patient resource.
TestCases.PassFailCriteria: The Patient resource includes an address element with line=['123 Main St #1'], city='Anytown!', state='C@', and postalCode='912$4'.
